summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transactions for a specific account over the month of March 2015. It includes information on deposits, checks paid, service charges, and ending balances, as well as instructions for reporting errors or inquiries regarding the account.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account statement.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas 00802, Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The document details account transactions for March 2015, including checks paid and service charges.
The ending balance of the account as of March 31, 2015, is $141,463.87.
There are no overdraft fees for the calendar year mentioned in the statement.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors related to electronic and non-electronic funds transfers.
The account is associated with Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
